## WidgetState type

The state the widget is in. See the \[widget lifecycle\](../lifecycle) docs for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type WidgetState = "init" | "reset" | "ready" | "requesting" | "solving" | "verifying" | "completed" | "expired" | "error" | "destroyed";
```
